verses.verse: <S%G5119>"Then<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> will be <S%G3666>comparable<s%> to <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3933>virgins,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> their <S%G2985>lamps,<s%> and <S%G1831>went<s%> out to <S%G5222>meet<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom.<s%>
"And <S%G4002>five<s%> of them were <S%G3474>foolish,<s%> and <S%G4002>five<s%> were <S%G5429>prudent.<s%>
"For when the <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> their <S%G2985>lamps,<s%> they <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1637>oil<s%> with them,
but the <S%G5429>prudent<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G1637>oil<s%> in <S%G30>flasks<s%> along with their <S%G2985>lamps.<s%>
<S%G1161>"Now<s%> while the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> was <S%G5549>delaying,<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3573>got<s%> <S%G3573>drowsy<s%> and [began] to <S%G2518>sleep.<s%>
"But at <S%G3319>midnight<s%> <S%G3571><s%> there was a <S%G2906>shout,<s%> <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom!<s%> <S%G1831>Come<s%> out to <S%G529>meet<s%> [him.']
<S%G5119>"Then<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3933>virgins<s%> <S%G1453>rose,<s%> and <S%G2885>trimmed<s%> their <S%G2985>lamps.<s%>
"And the <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G5429>prudent,<s%> <S%G1325>'Give<s%> us <S%G1537>some<s%> of your <S%G1637>oil,<s%> for our <S%G2985>lamps<s%> are <S%G4570>going<s%> out.'

"But the <S%G5429>prudent<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3379>'No,<s%> there will not be <S%G714>enough<s%> for us and you [too;] <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G3123>instead<s%> to the <S%G4453>dealers<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> [some] for <S%G1438>yourselves.<s%>'

"And while they were <S%G565>going<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> to <S%G59>make<s%> the <S%G59>purchase,<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> in with him to the <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1062>feast;<s%> and the <S%G2374>door<s%> was <S%G2808>shut.<s%>
"And <S%G5305>later<s%> the <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G3933>virgins<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%> <S%G2962>lord,<s%> <S%G455>open<s%> up for us.'
"But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G281>'Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I do not <S%G3609>know<s%> you.'
"Be on the <S%G1127>alert<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> for you do not <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> the <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

"For [it is] <S%G5618>just<s%> <S%G5618>like<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> [about] to <S%G589>go<s%> on a <S%G589>journey,<s%> who <S%G2564>called<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1401>slaves,<s%> and <S%G3860>entrusted<s%> his <S%G5225>possessions<s%> to them.

"And to <S%G3739>one<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents,<s%> to <S%G3739>another,<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> and to <S%G3739>another,<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1411>ability;<s%> and he <S%G589>went<s%> on his <S%G589>journey.<s%>

<S%G2112>"Immediately<s%> the one who had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G2038>traded<s%> with them, and <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G243>more<s%> talents.
"In the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>manner<s%> the one who [had received] the <S%G1417>two<s%> [talents] <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>more.<s%>
"But he who <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> [talent] <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G3736>dug<s%> in the <S%G1093>ground,<s%> and <S%G2928>hid<s%> his master's <S%G694>money.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> a <S%G4183>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> the <S%G2962>master<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1401>slaves<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4868>settled<s%> <S%G3056>accounts<s%> with them.

"And the one who had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up and <S%G4374>brought<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G243>more<s%> <S%G5007>talents,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>'Master,<s%> you <S%G3860>entrusted<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%> to me; <S%G2396>see,<s%> I have <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G243>more<s%> <S%G5007>talents.<s%>'

"His <S%G2962>master<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, <S%G2095>'Well<s%> <S%G2095>done,<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1401>slave;<s%> you were <S%G4103>faithful<s%> with a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G3641>things,<s%> I will <S%G2525>put<s%> you in <S%G2525>charge<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things,<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> into the <S%G5479>joy<s%> of your <S%G2962>master.<s%>'

"The <S%G3588>one<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> [had received] the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>'Master,<s%> you <S%G3860>entrusted<s%> to me <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5007>talents;<s%> <S%G2396>see,<s%> I have <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>more<s%> <S%G5007>talents.<s%>'

"His <S%G2962>master<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, <S%G2095>'Well<s%> <S%G2095>done,<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1401>slave;<s%> you were <S%G4103>faithful<s%> with a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G3641>things,<s%> I will <S%G2525>put<s%> you in <S%G2525>charge<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things;<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> into the <S%G5479>joy<s%> of your <S%G2962>master.<s%>'

"And the one <S%G2532>also<s%> who had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5007>talent<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>'Master,<s%> I <S%G1097>knew<s%> you to be a <S%G4642>hard<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2325>reaping<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> you did not <S%G4687>sow,<s%> and <S%G4863>gathering<s%> <S%G3606>where<s%> you <S%G1287>scattered<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> [seed.]

'And I was <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G2928>hid<s%> your <S%G5007>talent<s%> in the <S%G1093>ground;<s%> <S%G2396>see,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> is <S%G4674>yours.<s%>'

"But his <S%G2962>master<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, 'You <S%G4190>wicked,<s%> <S%G3636>lazy<s%> <S%G1401>slave,<s%> you <S%G3609>knew<s%> that I <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I did not <S%G4687>sow,<s%> and <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G3606>where<s%> I <S%G1287>scattered<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> [seed.]

<S%G3767>'Then<s%> you <S%G1163>ought<s%> to have <S%G906>put<s%> my <S%G694>money<s%> in the <S%G5133>bank,<s%> and on my <S%G2064>arrival<s%> I would have <S%G2865>received<s%> my [money] <S%G2865>back<s%> with <S%G5110>interest.<s%>
<S%G3767>'Therefore<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G5007>talent<s%> from him, and <S%G1325>give<s%> it to the one who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G5007>talents.<s%>'

"For to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> shall [more] be <S%G1325>given,<s%> and he shall <S%G4052>have<s%> an <S%G4052>abundance;<s%> but from the one who does not <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he does <S%G2192>have<s%> shall be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away.<s%>

"And <S%G1544>cast<s%> out the <S%G888>worthless<s%> <S%G1401>slave<s%> into the <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness;<s%> in that <S%G1563>place<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth.<s%>

"But <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> in His <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> with Him, <S%G5119>then<s%> He will <S%G2523>sit<s%> on His <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

"And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> will be <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> Him; and He will <S%G873>separate<s%> them from <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> as the <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> <S%G873>separates<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> from the <S%G2056>goats;<s%>
and He will <S%G2476>put<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> on His <S%G1188>right,<s%> and the <S%G2055>goats<s%> on the <S%G2176>left.<s%>

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> will <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> on His <S%G1188>right,<s%> <S%G1205>'Come,<s%> you who are <S%G2127>blessed<s%> of My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for you from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

'For I was <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> and you <S%G1325>gave<s%> Me [something] to <S%G2068>eat;<s%> I was <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> and you <S%G4222>gave<s%> Me <S%G4222>drink;<s%> I was a <S%G3581>stranger,<s%> and you <S%G4863>invited<s%> Me in;
<S%G1131>naked,<s%> and you <S%G4016>clothed<s%> Me; I was <S%G770>sick,<s%> and you <S%G1980>visited<s%> Me; I was in <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and you <S%G2064>came<s%> to Me.'

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> will <S%G611>answer<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%> <S%G4219>when<s%> did we <S%G3708>see<s%> You <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> and <S%G5142>feed<s%> You, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> and <S%G4222>give<s%> You <S%G4222>drink<s%>?
'And <S%G4219>when<s%> did we <S%G3708>see<s%> You a <S%G3581>stranger,<s%> and <S%G4863>invite<s%> You in, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1131>naked,<s%> and <S%G4016>clothe<s%> You?
'And <S%G4219>when<s%> did we <S%G3708>see<s%> You <S%G770>sick,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and <S%G2064>come<s%> to You?'

"And the <S%G935>King<s%> will <S%G611>answer<s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to them, <S%G281>'Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, to the <S%G1909>extent<s%> <S%G3745><s%> that you <S%G4160>did<s%> it to <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> of <S%G1473>Mine,<s%> [even] the <S%G1646>least<s%> [of them,] you <S%G4160>did<s%> it to Me.'

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> He will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> on His <S%G2176>left,<s%> <S%G4198>'Depart<s%> from Me, <S%G2672>accursed<s%> ones, into the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> which has been <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for the <S%G1228>devil<s%> and his <S%G32>angels;<s%>
for I was <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> and you <S%G1325>gave<s%> Me <S%G3756>[nothing<s%>] to <S%G2068>eat;<s%> I was <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> and you <S%G4222>gave<s%> Me nothing to <S%G4222>drink;<s%>

I was a <S%G3581>stranger,<s%> and you did not <S%G4863>invite<s%> Me in; <S%G1131>naked,<s%> and you did not <S%G4016>clothe<s%> Me; <S%G772>sick,<s%> and in <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and you did not <S%G1980>visit<s%> Me.'

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> they <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> will <S%G611>answer,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%> <S%G4219>when<s%> did we <S%G3708>see<s%> You <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3581>stranger,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1131>naked,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G772>sick,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and did not <S%G1247>take<s%> <S%G1247>care<s%> of You?'

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> He will <S%G611>answer<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G281>'Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, to the <S%G1909>extent<s%> <S%G3745><s%> that you <S%G4160>did<s%> not <S%G4160>do<s%> it to <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1646>least<s%> of <S%G3778>these,<s%> you <S%G4160>did<s%> not <S%G4160>do<s%> it to Me.'
"And <S%G3778>these<s%> will <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> into <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2851>punishment,<s%> but the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> into <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>"
